events.message: The customer reported an auto collision involving their vehicle that occurred on a busy intersection resulting in visible damage. They requested to file a claim immediately.
Upon review of the initial report, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to the nature of the incident involving the customer's car and a rear-end collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the case and is responsible for further communication and investigation related to the auto accident claim.
The claim was officially acknowledged and the customer was informed that their case is now active and will be processed shortly with dedicated support.
The agent requested the customer to submit photos of the vehicle damage along with the police accident report and insurance details to validate the claim.
Customer promptly submitted all requested documents including detailed photographs and official police report to support the auto accident claim investigation.
The investigation team began their assessment of the claim by analyzing submitted documents and contacting involved parties to verify the circumstances of the accident.
The investigation concluded with a confirmation that the customerâ€™s vehicle was damaged in a covered accident, with liability assigned to the other party.
A settlement offer was prepared and proposed to the customer covering the repair costs, rental vehicle reimbursement, and other related expenses.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the clear communication throughout the claim process.
Following acceptance of the settlement offer, the claim was officially approved for payment to be issued without further delay.
The payment was successfully issued to the vehicle repair shop and rental agency as part of the settlement agreement for the auto accident claim.
All obligations were fulfilled and the claim was officially closed in the system, marking the completion of the auto accident case.
The case file was archived for future reference and record-keeping in accordance with insurance company policies.
